website_summaries.verdict: Tops the competitors in almost every way – ideal shape, quality material, and expert-level application.
pros: A pack of 4 quality sponges with a contoured design for precise application
Ideal for liquid makeup – reduces waste by not soaking up too much at a time
cons: Slightly on the higher end of the price spectrum, but most users say that the quality you get for the price makes them a good deal

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT!
customer_reviews.text: These keep changing every time I order them and I’m very disappointed. The last time I ordered them, they were completely different than the time before that ( which was my first time buying this product), and I was worried I wouldn’t like them as much but I actually like them better! Well... I decided to order this 4-pack and they are completely different again! Not nearly as soft, squishy and light :( * edited to add that after reading the reviews I believe that these are fake. If you use the real ones and then use these, you will see the difference & how much worse these are. Go buy them from target instead!!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after few use
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews that this is the fake real techniques sponges, and I agree with that. All four sponges were ripped easily after few uses, and now I will go to target to get the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely without a doubt fake. I bought from an amazon seller "Real Techniques" and they are not as soft, they feel too hard in the middle. They also are cut weird at the circular tips. I wonder if I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hamrin

customer_reviews.title: Fake sponges
customer_reviews.text: These are FAKE sponges!!!! Do not buy, they feel and work nothing like the ones from ULTA. Ugh, should have known better!
customer_reviews.author: Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Not the Original/ Not Consistent Creation
customer_reviews.text: So, either this is fake, or I got a bad batch. I have used the first sponge for maybe 7-10 uses... I could immediately tell something was off. It is much more porous and dense than the original sponge! I even went out and bought a sponge from a retailer to compare, and this sponge is very obviously a different texture and density. It doesn’t blend nearly as nicely, and those larger pores cause my makeup to look splotchy when applying. I’ve since turned to using a brush. I’m severely disappointed. I’ve ordered this sponge from other places on amazon and it was fine, so just BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first cleaning before used second ripped after one use. The other 2 I'm sure will do same
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but after one use one ripped and after only cleaning second extremely ripped. I hope all aren't this terrible I went through so many reviews and wish I'd listened to negative reviews
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blending Sponges For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for blending foundation and concealer. I always dampen the sponge before applying foundation and I get seamless coverage. The sponges are super easy to clean and last quite a long time, even with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best for applying foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Attractive for it’s great quality and reasonable price, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Super blending sponges
customer_reviews.text: Inordered the blending sponges, saved a ton on those as well, four for 8-9$ versuses two for 9$. When the time comes I will order again, but only from Amazon. Like many of the other reviews, the sponges blend with perfection. You definitely have to replace everything month or every other month, depending upon your usage. Get the four pack and your set for four months. I plan to order two or three more sets to have in hand.
customer_reviews.author: jarutha

customer_reviews.title: Great great great !
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember how many items of this sponge I have bought in the past. I have been use it for many years and recommend to many of my friends, all of them gave positive feedback and purchased it consistently. I like to change sponge every three months. The beauty blender sponge is amazing too, but I am a little short of budget to change beauty blender sponge every three months. The real technique sponge became the best choice, because it’s not just much cheaper compared to beauty blender, it also does amazing blending job. The outcome is very very slightly different.
customer_reviews.author: sese

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The $20 Alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I've done it... I've went and bought the $20 higher-end version of this sponge before. I was NOT impressed. I've been loyal to Real Techniques sponges since I started doing makeup 6 years ago and don't ever see myself switching... the other sponges at this price point just don't match up! I love using the flat bottom to blend in foundation, then the pointed top for concealer and getting super close to the inner corner of my eye. I've found that both my foundation and concealer blend out EVEN BETTER after I started doing this. My only wish is that Real Techniques made a sponge cleaner that was made specifically for their sponges!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: FAKE sponges
customer_reviews.text: Real real technique sponges are soft and gets fluffy when you run it under water. This one is glossy, almost like latex coated. It is so dense and does not blend. Also, the blender lost all its color after 2 uses. AND they won't let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: As I've always used these sponges this was a no-brainer; and comparing this to the certifiably genuine ones I own I can be 90% sure they are real. As a sponge, the RT blenders are fluffy and bouncy, and easier to clean that most others.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Clouser

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Removing 4 stars. I reordered these and the sponges I received this time are FAKE. I ordered these 4/16/2018 and now today on 4/11/2019 I am finally ordering more. They lasted almost an entire year, and I wear makeup every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth F.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not completely horribly BUT I KNOW for a fact that these are FAKE! As soon as I felt the sponge I could tell something was off... Upon wetting it my suspicion was confirmed. It feels a lot more soft and cheap quality that the original which I know will make it fall apart faster. Im really upset with this because I thought I was making an investment getting the 4 pack but considering how bad quality these feel they probably won't hold up as long as the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: W B Mahfood

customer_reviews.title: best blender EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a classic. They're super soft, blend your foundation PERFECTLY like it really looks airbrushed and smooth, especially if you pat your loose setting powder in with the sponge too. They're a great value, easily worth double what you actually pay. I don't even bother to use any other brand of sponge.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfered over the Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: These work great and I perfer them to the original beauty blender. At first, I bought these because I couldn't afford the beauty blender which was what I was exclusively using for quite some time. They took about a week to get used to the slightly different texture but their shape is far superior to the beauty blender, and I find the coverage and even-ness of application are equal to the beauty blender. I perfer to use these slightly damp and they do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: R. DENNIS

customer_reviews.title: I've found my soul mate
customer_reviews.text: This has been raved about time and time again on YouTube and instagram and all over other social medias so I decided to try one out about two years ago. From that moment on, I've fell in love with it! I've ourchased the original beauty blender twice now and I just can't use it after using this one! I always go back to this no matter what I use! And what is really great about this pack is that you save $10! Sold separately, these sponges cost $6.99/ea at Ulta, making a true to price 4-pack $27.96, but this one is only $17!!! That is amazing! And they will last you a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Avila

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! FAKE! AND MORE FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! The product I recently received, has the "RT" brand on it and I've never purchased any with that stamped on them. I thought it was strange but didn't think anything of it since it was possible they were re-branding the sponges. As soon as I wet the 1st beauty blender I knew immediately it was FAKE! This one is HARD, DENSE AND EXTREMELY difficult to blend. I will never purchase these from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Shontae H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BB alternative
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alternative to the beauty blender. Super soft high quality sponges that apply my foundation, concealer and powder perfectly without wasting product. Like other reviews warned, be sure this is from an authentic seller. Very happy to get this multipack so that I can use one while the other dries and use one for powder only and use one for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: LoobyLibby

customer_reviews.title: Always Buy Staple Items In Bulk
customer_reviews.text: I've used Real Techniques blending sponges for years now. These are the well-known and affordable blending sponge in the beauty community. Once these bad boys went on sale, I stuck them in my cart. Even the sale price for the four-pack at my local grocery store didn't have as good of a price as Amazon. I'll keep my eye out for the next price drop!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Better than a beauty blender, and a much better price
customer_reviews.text: I bought A beauty blender once and used it for a while and it does a great job and then I found these make up sponges online as a recommendation from a friend and I haven’t gone back. They are affordable and last a while and very easy to clean. I will continue to purchase these make up sponges versus spending $20 on a beauty blender.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good sponges!
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are not fake like everyone is saying. They are authentic and I've bought them from different sellers. There's NOTHING fake about these. My sponges were ABSOLUTELY perfect and applied my makeup better than the beauty blender. Thank you to the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. They fall apart after a couple of uses. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake
customer_reviews.text: It is a fake product it is not soft and it is not the original. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Luis Villalobos Leon

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: i live it. I used this product ever since it came out and I absolutely loved it! I buy a new one every 3-4 months the sponges keep falling apart. also This is my 3rd one that has let me down. and I dont know if there were any changes made to the materials of the sponge. 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: shanliang

customer_reviews.title: Real Techniques Complexion sponge
customer_reviews.text: My favorite way to use this sponge is by holding it under the faucet to make it damp with water. The sponge blends out any liquid or creams to perfection. Hands down these are my absolute favorite complexion sponges super soft to touch and gentle on the skin! I really can't compare because it's the only sponges I perfer to use while working on faces. I love that their is a four pack saves me so much money.
customer_reviews.author: BrownMakeupJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. Don’t waste your money buying them. Usually I get them from ulta ... I saw the cheap price and brought a set. I knew it was fake the moment i tried it out. The real one is soft and easy to apply. These were all hard and ripped after one wash. I should’ve checked the reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Quyen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time purchasing these sponges, but first time buying in a multi-pack. I can't say enough great things about these sponges. They are extremely affordable. They have great bounce to them and are very comfortable on the face. It's recommended to change them every few months, nad at this price isn't hard to do. I love that this multi-pack saves me money ocmpared to buying them as singles.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD  ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Took up a lot of my makeup
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this sponge soaked up a lot of my makeup. When I’m using my fingers I tend to use less foundation but for some reason when I use the sponge it seems like I have to use a lot more makeup. Its also not as soft as I anticipated. It could be a lot softer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Just average
customer_reviews.text: I don't see much "tech" in the sponge, it sokes a large patio of the liquid foundation and the application does not seem any different with the non-branded ones I bought. Won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sinowiwi~

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product!
customer_reviews.text: They blend makeup alright, but I first purchased these sponges from Ulta and fell in love with them. They last forever, wash beautifuly, and blend beautifully. I am convinced that these sponges for sale are counterfeit because they tear and break apart after only a couple weeks. Plus they are a lot softer than the ones I got from Ulta. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: aaron rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Tried them as a replacement to the oh so pricey beauty blender.. I like these better and they are way cheaper. The sliced off end is the best for getting foundation under my eyes. This sponge is somewhat firmer and bouncier than the beauty blender but for me, that is a pro. I have used them with a variety of foundations without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Theoni Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love these squishy things!!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove these sponges! They are one of the best alternatives you can get instead of the original Beauty Blender, at the fraction of the price. Gives me a smooth application and takes away a lot of the cake that can go on if you use a brush. One sponge usually lasts me 2-3 months if you really know how to wash and take care of it. I recently started buying these in bulk on here because it's a great deal. Usually there things are $5 each at Ulta but you can get this pack of 4 for $13. Pretty much getting one for free!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Fake RT sponges
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I purchasers a fake sponges! I been used the RT sponges for so many feel. But this time what I feel is terrible hard material! Bad experience! Do not recommend! Wouldn’t give one star even! Do not purchase it from this buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get dirty
customer_reviews.text: This is a needed stuff for me. It works well at first but got dirty after several times of use and difficult to wash. The price is a little high. Otherwise it is still acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get really good sponges?
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best make up sponges one can buy. I had old soft, ones that are no longer for sale, and I kept washing them until they disintegrated. I finally looked for the "best high-end make up sponges" and ordered these. If you want something that will do it all, smoothly, quickly, with blending edges, washable in the washing machine, get these. I wish I hadn't waited so long to use the best. I actually look forward to doing my make up now instead of dreading it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin sexton

customer_reviews.title: Will always repurchase for myself and clients.
customer_reviews.text: I go through so many of these on clients. Great value. Blends out foundation, concealer and contour perfectly. Prefer over beauty blender because of price. Absorbs a little more product then the BB but, if you know what your doing they're just fine. Btw they're Authentic..lol
customer_reviews.author: Makeupnutz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best makeup sponge out there. The versatility or different angles of the sponge has it’s specific uses without changing sponge which I like. The quality is very good and not abrasive to the face/skin. Great price from Amazon compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Geri D.

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable beauty sponge
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use these for years now. They really are the closest things to a beauty blender and for the price you cannot beat it! I like to have several on hand because once they start to break down I like to use a new one. I would say they last a good month and a half. I use mine daily and wash it daily. If you don’t use yours that often then it can last much longer I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comparable and Maybe Superior to a Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of my top options. I locked on to the Beauty Blender several years ago but got tired of paying 20 bucks every time I wanted a new one! These sponges are comparable in texture, do the trick, and have a better variety of shapes/edges for using all around your face. I don't plan on going back to the Beauty Blender any time soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down the best drugstore alternative to the BeautyBlender
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for years, ever since they came out. Even with regular washing, I don't love using makeup sponges for too long at a time hygienically speaking. BeautyBlenders are the original and it's hard to compete with them, but considering the price of a single BeautyBlender at $20. It's just an unrealistic expense, especially when you can get 4 Real Techniques Sponges for the same price. I've tried everything under the sun, and honestly the RT sponges are the closest to the real thing I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Not bad at all. I wasn't expecting much, but this turned out to be a really good buy. Of course, not as soft and pliable as the original beauty blender. This is a great runner up though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only use sponges!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time going from a brush to sponges for my foundation and concealer, they work incredibly well! They last about three months for me, I rotate them every week. They work their best for the first month with some decline in holding the product afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Brittster

customer_reviews.title: Strange beauty blenders
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to feel about these beauty blenders. They don’t look the same as the real technique beauty blender from the store. By that I mean the real technique sponge from the store are a lighter orange and bigger than the ones I received from here. Also I don’t know if anyone else dealt with the same issue but these beauty blenders randomly get stains on them.
customer_reviews.author: Brindi S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's good for putting the foundation on my face, but it's easy to get dirty and not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sponges. I can't compare them to beauty blender, but I've heard these are better. They're super easy to use and clean. Also a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Real product. Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I took a chance and bought these, I know a lot of people said they got a fake product, but mine is real, fortunately! One of these is about $6 so 4 of them for $10 is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: These are FAKE ASS sponges. As soon as you open the package all you can smell is toxic chemicals. Horrible with blending and extremely hard. DONT BUY THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sponges as an alternative to the expensive BeautyBlender. I am very pleased with these sponges. I use a wet one to apply foundation, and use a dry one to apply powders. They absorb water easily and keep their shape, even after weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: maggie harrison

customer_reviews.title: Favorite makeup sponge
customer_reviews.text: One of my makeup staples that I can’t go without. Love the four pack last me for sometime without having to worry about running out of this goodness right here definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alawi M. Algumaee

customer_reviews.title: Very Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these in big brand name stores before and didn't realize they marked them up so much. Exact same package cost me almost $25 and here I saved $10!
customer_reviews.author: Soozett

customer_reviews.title: I Use them everyday ❤️
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to I love them love the price love the brand I used to use the beauty blender brand but once I came across these I never went back these are better price wise and they work just as great if not better looooce these! Anyone that is into makeup knows this is a must have
customer_reviews.author: felix

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beauty Blender!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AWESOME I can’t believe I used to waste money buying the beautyblender... this works better and better price! And it has a flat part!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t spread product evenly
customer_reviews.text: The sponge does get fluffy while wet. I can put my powder on with it but i can not spread my liquid foundation evenly with this evenly. It’s blotchy. I love the small purple ones from them I don’t know if it’s just this or i got a bad batch or something
customer_reviews.author: Shante clay

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of other customers have reviewed these sponges as fake. I believe they are the real deal. They work just as Real Technique sponges that I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister l, just going to assume it’s good since she didn’t say anything bad about the product
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: Some of my favorite blending brushes! The finish is smooth and skin like. They are durable and does not take a lot to clean them. The best way to clean these is with Dawn antibacterial soap and coconut oil. Clean as new and no damage to the blenders
customer_reviews.author: LaLa T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this sponge. It has basically the same feel and texture as the original beauty blender but doubled the size and you get four for $17. This really is a hard bargain to beat. It blends make up flawlessly and I really WON'T go back to using makeup sponges or buy hand. The difference is just that huge. I will be buying these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Evrain

customer_reviews.title: wash it before using.
customer_reviews.text: I like this sponge, good quality. However, it should be washed before using because there is orange dye on it.
customer_reviews.author: roar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The 1st time I got these they were amazing. The 2nd time I ordered them I tried to wash them and they practically fell apart...disappointed bc I wanted to like them but not if I can only use them each ONCE
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: FAKE SPONGE. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: NOT AUTHENTIC SPONGE. DO NOT BUY. Feels and smells 100% different then the ones I've bought multiple times at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A travel must have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling to keep beauty blenders clean and easy to pack. Has small vent to help with drying when your in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Harv

customer_reviews.title: Quantity and Quality in one affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these sponges are affordable and they blend my makeup so nicely. I love them so much and I’d buy them all over again. So much better than spending $20 on just once sponge
customer_reviews.author: Esmie

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Sponge!
customer_reviews.text: These makeup sponges spread your makeup evenly. I love them! They are the best sponge I have ever tried! The only downside is a sponge is that it soaks up your makeup. I have read reviews on acrylic sponges and they do not work to well!
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best sponges!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been repurchasing and using these sponges for years and they are the best out there. They apply makeup like a dream and they are a great price. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Merrie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 4 years and have not found any sponges like this! This is so soft and even works better if you soak it in the water just a few seconds and squeeze. Amazon has reasonable price and sometimes gets cheaper with the coupon!
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and it’s SO much cheaper than purchasing them at Walmart. Highly recommend this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P.

customer_reviews.title: Great sponges
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy these in bulk because I love them and it's much cheaper that way. They do soak up a bit of product even when wet, so if that is a concern, look into the juno sponge. Been loving that one just as much
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Better than the beauty blender brand
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these over the beauty blender. Their so soft and fairly priced. You can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quality and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Only Make up applicator I use!!! It applies my foundation flawlessly.. I always wet my sponge, squeeze it out with a towel and it gives such a lovely dewy complexion!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best Make Up blender sponge
customer_reviews.text: I tried different blender sponges and I like this product best:) It works for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE REAL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Value for your money is the best!!! LET ME CLARIFY, THESE ARE NOT FAKE!!!👏🏻 They are sold directly through the Real Techniques Amazon Store. They are EXACTLY packaged as if I bought them from Ulta!!✨💖 I'm super happy. Please just do yourself a favor save the money and buy them here in bulk!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin r.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sponge
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s easy to wash and lasts a while. These sponges makes putting on foundation so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a cheap sponge I bought from t j maxx. They are ok, but are tearing faster than cheaper sponge. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Fake .
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. Horrible . When i went to clean them it was hard to get the makeup out of them & when i squeeze it it doesn’t go back to its regular shape .
customer_reviews.author: Dime

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are the only reusable sponges I have used, switched from disposables about 5 years ago. First time ordering from this seller but definitely not fake as other reviewers have eluded to. They’re a great value, wash great, and for the price I don’t feel guilty for tossing them out as often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural makeup application with product.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Makes a 100% difference when applying makeup! Definately goes on more evenly and more natural. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Flawless application
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality sponges. They offer a flawless application of makeup. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cosmetic tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect amount of softness and tension. I use always
customer_reviews.author: kloe

customer_reviews.title: Better than brushes
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to put on foundation and concealer without the strikes left by make up brushes. This gives you a more solid, flawless look. You just have to replace and clean them all the time but they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUD

customer_reviews.title: I like to use this brand of powder puff.
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this brand of powder puff. Compared with the one I bought at sephora for $20, this brand is more favorable in price and good in use
customer_reviews.author: Li Juan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be compared to a Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: I was told they are as good as a beauty blender. But no way! It can’t be compared. It soaks in all the foundation and unlike beauty blender it has a plasticy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Miz S.

customer_reviews.title: Just case no sponge
customer_reviews.text: I thought it came with a sponge, but other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this 4 pack - this is my favorite sponge of multiple brands I have tried! It spreads both liquid and stick foundation well, handles all concealer and color correction and can do liquid and cream blush. It is easy to clean but also easy to replace given the great price.
customer_reviews.author: DaniO35

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, these are the best, my absolute favorite!
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft, but one of them molded after my third time used.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Beauty Blender Dupes
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, 4 real techniques blending sponges at a cheaper rate than if I had bought them individually. I will say though the actual sponges are great and blend pretty well, they don't last very long and I don't even use mine often.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Fave sponges
customer_reviews.text: I've used real techniques tools for years. Worked at ulta and recieved 20% this was a steal in comparison. A 2 pack of these are valued at $10.99 in most places. Very great buy and will be stocking up in the future 😁
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite beauty blenders. I buy them all the time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KaydeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Great for it’s value
customer_reviews.text: Omg ,I love real technique sponges. So cheap when on sale yet it’s so good for everything!
customer_reviews.author: X. Jin

customer_reviews.title: Not real technique at all
customer_reviews.text: These sponges were super hard (even when wet) nothing like the Real technique sponges I bought from Ulta It doesn’t even seem like the same brand
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute favorite foundation applicator! These are the best and this is an amazing price. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Williams

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: didn't buy this, but I like to give 5 stars, you continue to delete
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great value for money. much better then buying them individually
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Real Techniques line
customer_reviews.text: Love the Real Techniques line. I have a visual impairment and find that there sponges work amazing for me. They do get ratty over time like any other product but It's a lot cheaper than the Beauty Blender to have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Oswin2512

customer_reviews.title: RT Miracle sponge is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite! Although one of them in this pack was a little off. It didn't perform as well as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Jannelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well but soaks up liquid makeup
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are great for getting that smooth look when applying makeup. The only drawback is you tend to use more liquid makeup because the sponges soak up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sivley

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean with dawn soap and makeup cleaning mat. Perfect texture, i find beauty blenders too soft
customer_reviews.author: Chinda Phy

customer_reviews.title: The best in the game for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all brands of blenders. This is the best in regards to texture, durability and value.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

product_meta.title: Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Beauty Sponge Makeup Blender, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Style Name:ComplexionOptimize your beauty routine with the #1 branded makeup sponge. This versatile beauty tool was designed with a revolutionary foam technology to evenly blend makeup for a smooth, enhanced finish. Use damp for a dewy glow or dry for a full coverage. Samantha and Nicola Chapman grew up surrounded by makeup. Their aunt was a top makeup artist in London, working with clients like David Bowie and Princess Diana. Their mum was makeup-involved too, always trying out the latest trends and being creative with her looks. As young girls, they experimented on one another, and of course Nic was the test subject, since Sam was the older sister. When it came time to choose their career path, it was clear that makeup artistry was the way to go. They were talented, creative, and keen to follow in the footsteps of their successful aunt. But, most importantly — they were passionate about beauty. In 2011, the Real Techniques brush collection was launched. Unbelievable brush quality was paired with professional, interesting, fun education from Sam and Nic. The launch day was memorable, as women from around the world started pouring to the website to learn more about this new brand. Fairly quickly, a global community of women who loved makeup began to form. Not only do they have a strong connection to Sam & Nic, but they also connect with one another — piping in on social media to answer questions and give input. Today, the brand has taken off in the US, UK, and around the world. Sam and Nic continue to grow as top makeup artists, writing columns for national magazines and newspapers, appearing on major network television as beauty experts, and editing their own digital magazine. Through Real Techniques, women everywhere are transforming their makeup routines, and themselves, with the approachable expertise, friendship, and tools from Sam & Nic.
feature_bullets: MIRACLE COMPLEXION SPONGE: Get ready for an airbrushed look and flawless application with this 4-piece makeup beauty sponge set covers a full face, corrects any misshapes and adds color to your favorite features.

BLENDER SPONGE SET: Use rounded sides to blend large areas of the face with a dabbing motion; the precision tip covers blemishes and imperfections; use flat edge for contouring around the eyes and nose.

PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP BRUSHES: From foundation to liner our brushes & beauty sponges flawlessly apply primer, concealer, eyeshadow & more. Keep your brushes germ free & clean with our makeup brush & sponge cleansers.

QUALITY MAKEUP APPLICATORS: We provide brushes for primer, concealer, foundation, color correction, highlight, contour & more. Look for some of our makeup brushes & sponges that're ideal for liquids, creams & powder.
REAL TECHNIQUES: Launching in 2011, Real Techniques created cruelty free makeup brushes with you in mind. Goodbye basic eyeshadow applicators & fingers - hello high quality makeup brushes.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
